Peoples of the Sea

All units gain ocean navigation capability as they can get on board.[NEWLINE]Gain one free builder at the beginning of each new era.[NEWLINE] +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Science] Science from coast and ocean.
Big seven's Power(Nagato)
Big seven's Power(Mutsu)
Maizuru Sky

Allows coastal raiding for all naval melee units.[NEWLINE]When they eliminate a unit, they heal up to 50 hit points.[NEWLINE] Culture Bomb adjacent tiles when completing an Encampment or Industrial Zone inside friendly territory.
Allows coastal raiding for all naval melee units.[NEWLINE]Holy Site and Harbor districts in half the time.[NEWLINE]Builders receive an additional charge.

+50% [ICON_Production] Production toward all air units.[NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Production] Production from Aerodrome, Hanger and Airport. +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture from Airport.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Science] Science from [ICON_RESOURCE_COPPER] Copper, [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron, [ICON_RESOURCE_SILVER] Silver and [ICON_RESOURCE_MERCURY] Mercury.
Imperial Navy Yard

A building unique to Imperial Japanese Navy. +25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. Bonus [ICON_Production] Production equal to the adjacency bonus of the Harbor district. +2 [ICON_Science] Science, +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. +2 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] great admiral points per turn. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for each House Boat in this city.

A building unique to Imperial Japanese Navy. +25% combat experience for all naval units trained in this city. Bonus [ICON_Production] Production equal to the adjacency bonus of the Harbor district. +2 [ICON_Science] Science, +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. +2 [ICON_GreatAdmiral] great admiral points per turn. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food for each House Boat in this city. +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on all unimproved Coast tiles for this city.
Imperial Japanese Navy unique building: Imperial Navy Yard
House Boat

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a House Boat, unique to Imperial Japanese Navy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold, [ICON_Production] Production and +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Can be built on Coasts and Oceans.
Imperial Japanese Navy unique improvement: House Boat
Nagato/Mutsu unique unit: Nagato Type Battleship

Nagato/Mutsu unique unit that replaces the Battleship. Stronger than the Normal Battleship. 4 [ICON_Movement] Movement. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength if there is at least one Destroyer adjacent.
Nagato Type Battleship
Nagato/Mutsu unique unit: Nagato Type DDG
Nagato/Mutsu unique unit that replaces the Missile Cruiser. Stronger than the Normal Missile Cruiser. +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending against ranged units.
Nagato Type DDG
Taiho unique unit: Taiho Type Aircraft Carrier
Taiho unique unit that replaces the Aircraft Carrier. +3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength, +1 Air slots.
Taiho Type Aircraft Carrier
